title: Draw wind barbs — windBarbs
code: library(atm) L <- 8 plot(c(-L, L), c(-L, L), asp = 1, type = "n", xlab = "", ylab = "") y <- -7 windBarbs(0, y, 70 * cospi(45 / 180), 70 * sinpi(45 / 180), scale = 2, colFlags = grey(0.9)) text(1, y, 70) y <- y + 1 windBarbs(0, y, 70, 0, scale = 2, colFlags = grey(0.9)) text(1, y, 70) y <- y + 1 for (i in 0:13) {     windBarbs(0, y, 65 - 5 * i, 0, scale = 2, colFlags = grey(0.9))     text(1, y, 65 - 5 * i)     y <- y + 1 }
